title: Stability of Ti3C2Tx MXenes in engineered environments
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,494-506
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00438D, Paper
Nasim Ganji, Christian A. Reardon-Lochbaum, Swapnil B. Ambade, Caroline M. Anastasia, Patrick M. Eckhert, Zeev Rosenzweig, Joel A. Pedersen, D. Howard Fairbrother
MXenes are a newer class of 2D materials with desirable properties, making them attractive for various environmental applications, including remediation and as membranes for water treatment.
